statements: UPDATE social_media_data SET post_text = 'New post text', sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE id = 1

UPDATE social_media_data SET post_text = 'Updated post text', sentiment_score = 0.75 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE social_media_data SET user_id = 100, post_date = '2022-01-15 13:00:00' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET post_content = 'Updated post content' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET sentiment_score = 8.5, post_date = '2022-10-15 15:30:00' WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET post_content = 'Updated post content', sentiment_score = 4.2 WHERE post_id = 100
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET user_id = 25, post_date = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE post_id = 150
UPDATE social_media_posts SET post_content = 'New post content' WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8, sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE sentiment_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174098';
UPDATE social_media_posts SET post_content = 'New post content' WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8, sentiment_category = 'positive' WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET likes_count = 500, shares_count = 200 WHERE post_id = 10;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE posts SET likes_count = likes_count - 50, shares_count = shares_count + 20 WHERE post_id = 54321;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE comments SET comment_text = 'Updated comment text', user_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', post_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE comment_id = 'abcd1234-5678-90ab-cdef-0123456789ab';
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 'abc-1234';
UPDATE comments SET comment_text = 'Updated comment' WHERE comment_id = 'def-5678';
